sentences.english: The maggots also provide a cool, pre-industrial expiration date.
sentences.chinese: 而这蛆还有一个很酷的，工业化以前的终止日期。

sentences.english: As you can see, as long as the initial value is above zero, this function will terminate.
sentences.chinese: 可见，只要初始值大于零，这个函数就能够终止。

sentences.english: I only know whether theGolden Path continues or ends.
sentences.chinese: 我只知道黄金之路是持续还是终止。

sentences.english: This function terminates the running process and all the associated threads.
sentences.chinese: 这个函数终止运行中的进程及其相关线程。

sentences.english: But two wrongs can never make a right, because two wrongs can never equal each other.
sentences.chinese: 冤冤相报永无终止，因为两种伤害永远不能抵消。

sentences.english: If the device finds the system holding the 'clock' line inactive, the transmission is terminated.
sentences.chinese: 如果设备发现主机系统将电平拉低，就终止传输。

sentences.english: Their employees enjoy life tenure and cannot be terminated.
sentences.chinese: 其员工享有职位终身制，无法终止劳动关系。

sentences.english: The promenade ends with the stairs leading up to the museum's observation tower.
sentences.chinese: 长廊终止于直通博物馆瞭望塔的楼梯。

sentences.english: The thermal therapy terminated after the terminal germ seminar.
sentences.chinese: 热疗在期末细菌研讨会吿终止了。

sentences.english: Next stop is Ping Shan. The end of Zone 4 for single-ride ticket.
sentences.chinese: 下一站系屏山，单程车票第四收费区终止。

sentences.english: Multiple sign-ups shall be grounds for immediate termination of all involved accounts.
sentences.chinese: 多迹象上升将是全部复杂的账的立即终止的理由。

sentences.english: They have stopped asking Summer to study with them too.
sentences.chinese: 他们也终止了与桑玛一起学习。

sentences.english: Our trad agreement with Britain will expire at the end of this year.
sentences.chinese: 我们与英国的贸易协定将在今年年底终止。

sentences.english: Then the magnetic connection between the cloud and the surrounding medium will be broken.
sentences.chinese: 其时云和周围介质间的磁联系就终止了。

sentences.english: This also means that there is no external power that produces the arising and the cessation of dukkha.
sentences.chinese: 这也意味着没有外面的力量来产生或终止苦难。

sentences.english: The employer may, on the basis of aforesaid regulation, terminate the labor contract.
sentences.chinese: 用人单位依据前述规定，均可以终止劳动合同。

definition: to cease/to suspend/to break off/to stop/to discontinue
to cut short/to break off/to discontinue/to interrupt
end/conclusion/to come to an end/to terminate (sth)
to remove/to sack/to get rid of/to relieve (sb of their duties)/to free/to lift (an embargo)/to rescind (an agreement)
to withdraw/to abort/to quit/to log out (computing)
